prayer.title: 🕊️ Morning Prayer
prayer.modeh_ani: מודה אני לפניך — I gratefully thank You, living and eternal King, for returning my soul within me with compassion — great is Your faithfulness.
prayer.blessing: Blessed are You who gives strength to the weary and renews the spirit of the exhausted.
prayer.psalm: Psalm 90:17: "May the favor of the Lord our God rest on us; establish the work of our hands."
prayer.proverb: Proverbs 27:23: "Know well the condition of your flocks, and give attention to your herds."
prayer.intention: Help me be present with my family. Let my work create margin, not distance.
prayer.closing: Baruch atah Adonai — Blessed are You, Lord, who renews creation daily with goodness.

weather.title: ☀️ Weather — Temecula, CA
weather.summary: Beautiful Friday ahead. High near 70°F, low 42°F. Clear skies all day — perfect weather for the weekend.

mre.title: 📊 MRE Trading
mre.regime_detail: SPY sideways (681.27), QQQ sideways (600.64). VIX elevated at 21.84. Only 3/11 sectors advancing.
mre.no_plays_reason: All 24 assets signaling HOLD. Fear at 35 hasn't breached the 25 panic-buy threshold. No BUY triggers today.

pair_signals.detail: EEM overvalued vs SPY (z-score 2.17). Buy SPY, sell EEM. 81.5% confidence.

mre.breadth: BULL — RSP outperforming SPY (breadth expanding). 6/10 advancing days.
mre.polymarket: Bearish signal. Top events: Trump Fed Chair nomination, China-Taiwan risk, tariff revenue tracking.
mre.thesis: Fear elevated at 35 but not panic-level. Sideways regime = choppy. Defensives and energy leading, tech lagging. No buys until fear drops below 25 or regime shifts. Watch the EEM/SPY pair revert opportunity.
mre.pulse: NEUTRAL — Models diverge: F&G says fear, cycle says mid-bull. Reduce position sizes, focus on mean-reversion plays.

family.title: ❤️ Family Focus
recommendations: PRIORITY: Focus on repair. Acknowledge recent conflicts without defending.
Increase acts of service dramatically this week.
Create space for her to express frustrations without fixing.
family.action_today: It's Friday — perfect for an intentional date night or quality evening together. No screens, no work talk. Just be present.

items.headline: Trump tells Herzog he should be 'ashamed' for not pardoning Netanyahu — political tensions escalate between Washington and Jerusalem
Israel looks to wean itself off US aid — PM urges 'maximal independence' while officials warn shift could destabilize region
Ex-Shin Bet chiefs issue rare joint letter condemning 'unprecedented attacks' on security agency by coalition members
UK High Court rules banning of anti-Israel Palestine Action group unlawful
Israeli skier Attila Kertesz makes history as first Israeli Olympic cross-country skier at Milano Cortina 2026
Iranian Jewish community in Israel protests in support of Iranian people near US Embassy in Tel Aviv
Trump announces 'reciprocal tariffs' on all countries with trade barriers — April implementation planned, sparking diplomatic scramble
Religious Liberty Commission's first antisemitism hearing turns contentious over Israel policy — mostly conservative panel debates campus and cultural antisemitism
Epstein files: Unredacted documents thrust Les Wexner back into spotlight with looming deposition
Sudan RSF committed war crimes in El Fasher capture, UN rights office confirms — possible crimes against humanity
Taiwan hikes 2026 economic growth forecast to 7.7% driven by AI demand — Polymarket tracking China-Taiwan invasion risk
Capgemini CEO dismisses calls for full European tech autonomy amid fraying transatlantic relations
Anthropic raises $30B in Series G at $380B valuation — on track for $14B annual revenue, targeting break-even by 2028 (two years ahead of OpenAI)
Claude Sonnet 4.5 sets new benchmark records in coding, reasoning, and computer use — Agent SDK released for building capable agents
Anthropic vs OpenAI: Super Bowl ad war — Anthropic campaign lampoons targeted advertising in AI products, courting enterprise customers
Oracle raising $50B for AI infrastructure expansion — massive data center buildout despite stock dip from investor caution
Belgian study warns AI recruitment bias far worse than expected — 'de-biasing' techniques are superficial, proxy variables still penalize women
Taiwan AI Impact Summit 2026 — indigenous LLM development and data center funding on agenda
